verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Here in Your arms,
I am lost in Your love.
Holding me close,
Never let me fall.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Here, face to face,
I am lost in praise.
Love's hunger grows,
Burning stronger still.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will worship You,
I will worship You,
Oh I, I will worship You, Lord.
